alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 19 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN DAVIDSON AND SOUTHWESTERN SUMNER COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Joelton, or 7 miles east of Ashland City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, Millersville, Lakewood, Old Hickory, Hermitage, Joelton, Beaman Park, Whites Creek, and Green Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 87 and 101. Interstate 24 between mile markers 33 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
